entry.source: Let's start our usual demon-slaying{F801}competition. The first person to slay {F804,5}{F878,1}{F804,0}{F801}Wilder {F804,5}{F873,1}{F804,0}s takes the prize.{F801}Are you in it for the money, or the glory?{F801}I don't care! You're all welcome!{F801}I'm looking forward to a large turnout.{F801}
